Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
Direct Known Subclasses:
Basketball, Football, Hockey, Soccer
public abstract class Game extends Object
The Game class is an abstract class that represents a general sports game. The class defines common functionalities and attributes that sports share in common
Version:
1.0.0, 30, Oct 2024
Author:
Scott Pearson

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Team homeTeam, Team awayTeam)
      Constructor for the Game class. Initializes a game with specified home and away teams
      Parameters:
      homeTeam - The home team
      awayTeam - The away team

  • Method Details

    • getScoringMethods

      public abstract List<ScoringMethods> getScoringMethods()
      Abstract method that retrieves the list of scoring methods specific to a game
      Returns:
      A list of scoring methods for a specific game

    • getPeriodLength

      public abstract int getPeriodLength()
      Abstract method that retrieves the length of each period in a game
      Returns:
      an int representation of the length of a period in minutes

    • getPeriodName

      public abstract String getPeriodName()
      Abstract method that retrieves the name of the period of a game
      Returns:
      a string representation of the name of the period

    • getMaxPeriods

      public abstract int getMaxPeriods()
      Abstract method that retrieves the maximum number of periods in a game
      Returns:
      an int representation of the max number of periods

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game by initializing the current period and scores. Resets the game state so the scores are reset and the game is not over

    • endPeriod

      public void endPeriod()
      Ends the current period of the game. It either increments to the next period or ends the game if the maximum period count is reached

    • addScore

      public void addScore(ScoringMethods scoringMethods, Team team)
      Adds points to specified team's score based on the scoring method Only adds score if the game is still ongoing
      Parameters:
      scoringMethods - The scoring method used to add points
      team - The team that scored the points

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over
      Returns:
      True if game is over, false if game is ongoing

    • getWinningTeam

      public Team getWinningTeam()
      Determines the winning team based on comparing scores
      Returns:
      the team with the higher score, or null if there is a tie

    • getHomeTeam

      public Team getHomeTeam()
      Getter that retrieves the home team
      Returns:
      the home team

    • getAwayTeam

      public Team getAwayTeam()
      Getter that retrieves the away team
      Returns:
      the away team

    • getCurrPeriod

      public int getCurrPeriod()
      Getter that retrieves the current period in a game
      Returns:
      the current period
